text: While I"m sure it's all good intentions from Microsoft I had to fix my parents email on the weekend. For whatever reason when outlook setup their mail profile it dumped the pst file in My Documents rather than the %localappdata% location they saw the pop up and thought. having our stuff auto backup to the cloud makes sense and is a good idea. we have the storage in onedrive so why not. again for whatever reason onedrive decided to keep the files in the cloud outlook didn't like this and the pst was reset to 256kb and they effectively lost all their mail history. I managed to get it back using a file recovery and as the blocks weren't overwritten it was successful and have moved the pst outside of a sync location. Crisis averted but surely I"m not the only one to have seen this?
